name: Pre-commit
body:
CocoaPod that automatically installs a git pre-commit hook from the working directory whenever you run `pod install`.

### Quick Start

1. Add `pod "pre-commit"` to Podfile.
2. `mkdir -p .hooks/ && echo "exit 0" > .hooks/pre-commit`
3. `pod install`

### Recommended uses
* Run unit tests or analyzer via [xctool](https://github.com/facebook/xctool)
* Run [OCLint](http://oclint.org/)
* Ensure commit message and author are up to spec.

### Inspiration/See Also
* https://npmjs.org/package/precommit-hook
* https://github.com/pgr0ss/rake_commit
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
